body: Remember kids, only rape girls that have crushes on you and masochist pigs
These guys, Satansoft, do pretty good coloring, I also liked those that they colored previously, shown at last page. Good shit.

Can anyone help me find a sauce?... Its about a guy who is married to some bitch woman who hates him and they both have a little girl. Hes struggling to take care of his family, but he start to become interested in this young cute girl who is nice to him. If i remember correctly he is a Teacher and the young girl is a student. Then it turns out that MCs finds out his wife ihas been cheating on him with another deadbeat man and his daughter is actually the deadbeat daughter, and the wife is just staying with the MC because shes using him for the money and waiting for the deadbeat to become a rich musician, even the daughter is on the plan (she likes the deadbeat more than MC). The young girl tells MC shes moving away, and MC is devastated. He plans to off himself but the young girl returns for him. In the end MC leaves his wife and chooses the young girl and they both are now living together and are singing their wedding paperwork. 
Any info on the sauce would be greatly appreciated 🙏.
